name: NSLogicalTest
desc: The logical combination of one or more specifier tests.

items.name: init(andTestWith: [NSSpecifierTest])
items.desc: Returns an NSLogicalTest object initialized to perform an AND operation with the NSSpecifierTest objects in a given array.

items.name: init(notTestWith: NSScriptWhoseTest)
items.desc: Returns an NSLogicalTest object initialized to perform a NOT operation on the given NSScriptWhoseTest object.

items.name: init(orTestWith: [NSSpecifierTest])
items.desc: Returns an NSLogicalTest object initialized to perform an OR operation with the NSSpecifierTest objects in a given array.
